sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
bound to happen
, se bo prav gotovo zgodilo.

To be bound by an agreement or law
pomeni imeti dolžnost, da se držimo sporazuma ali zakona.

seg.quote: We are bound by the government's pay policy.

sense.def:
Bounds
so meje, do katerih je dovoljeno nekaj početi.

seg.quote: It is not outside the bounds of possibility.

sense.def:
Kadar je območje ali ozemlje
bounded by something
, je tisto ob robu tistega območja ali ozemlja.

seg.quote: The plantation was bounded by marsh.

sense.def:
Kadar je vozilo
bound for a particular place
, potuje proti tistemu kraju.

seg.quote: He put her aboard the steamer bound for New York.

sense.def:
Kadar živali ali ljudje
bound
, se gibljejo hitro in v velikih skokih.

Bound
je tudi pretekli čas in pretekli deležnik glagola
to bind
.

‘I am bound to say’
ali
‘I am bound to admit’
lahko rečemo, kadar omenjamo dejstvo, ki ga obžalujemo.

seg.quote: Sometimes, I'm bound to say, they are a hopeless muddle.

sense.def:
Kadar je neka stvar
bound up with something
, je s tistim tesno povezana.

seg.quote: All this was bound up with what was happening in Egypt.

sense.def:
Kadar je neki kraj
out of bounds
, ljudem ni dovoljeno iti tja.
